trans-unit.source: Converts base data types to an array of bytes, and an array of bytes to base data types.
trans-unit.target: 將基底資料類型與位元組陣列相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter> class helps manipulate value types in their fundamental form, as a series of bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter>類別有助於管理在其基本形式中，實值類型為一系列的位元組。

trans-unit.source: A byte is defined as an 8-bit unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 位元組定義為 8 位元不帶正負號整數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter> class includes static methods to convert each of the primitive types to and from an array of bytes, as the following table illustrates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter>類別包含靜態方法，將每個基本類型與位元組陣列，如下列表格所示。

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: 類型

trans-unit.source: To byte conversion
trans-unit.target: 位元組轉換成

trans-unit.source: From byte conversion
trans-unit.target: 從位元組轉換

trans-unit.source: -or-
-or-
If you use <xref:System.BitConverter> methods to round-trip data, make sure that the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> overload and the `To`*Type* method specify the same type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.BitConverter>方法，以反覆存取的資料，請確定<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>多載而`To`*類型*方法指定相同的型別。

trans-unit.source: As the following example illustrates, restoring an array that represents a signed integer by calling the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToUInt32%2A> method can result in a value that is different from the original.
trans-unit.target: 如下列範例所示，還原的陣列，代表帶正負號的整數，藉由呼叫<xref:System.BitConverter.ToUInt32%2A>方法可能會導致與原始版本不同的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the entry [Working with Signed Non-Decimal and Bitwise Values](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186999) in the BCL Team Blog.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[使用簽署的非十進位和位元值](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186999)BCL Team 部落格中。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method overloads (as well as the order of bits in the integer returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits%2A> method and the order of hexadecimal strings returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> method) depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法多載 (傳回的整數中的位元的順序以及<xref:System.BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits%2A>方法和十六進位字串所傳回的順序<xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29>方法) 取決於是否由小到大或位元組由大到小電腦架構。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the order of bytes in the array and returned by the `To`*IntegerValue* methods and the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToChar%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，位元組陣列中的順序，並由傳回`To` *IntegerValue*方法和<xref:System.BitConverter.ToChar%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The endianness of an architecture is indicated by the <xref:System.BitConverter.IsLittleEndian> property, which returns `true` on little-endian systems and `false` on big-endian systems.
trans-unit.target: 架構的位元組序，但由<xref:System.BitConverter.IsLittleEndian>屬性，它會傳回`true`由小到大系統上和`false`位元組由大到小的系統上。

trans-unit.source: On little-endian systems, lower-order bytes precede higher-order bytes.
trans-unit.target: 由小到大在系統上，低序位位元組之前高序位位元組。

trans-unit.source: On big-endian system, higher-order bytes precede lower-order bytes.
trans-unit.target: Big endian 在系統上，高序位位元組之前低序位位元組。

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates the difference in the byte arrays that result from passing the integer 1,234,567,890 (0x499602D2) to the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%28System.Int32%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明的差異所導致的傳遞整數 1,234,567,890 (0x499602D2) 的位元組陣列中以<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%28System.Int32%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The bytes are listed in order from the byte at index 0 to the byte at index 3.
trans-unit.target: 位元組會從索引 0 處的位元組的位元組，位於索引 3 的順序列出。

trans-unit.source: Little-endian
trans-unit.target: 由小到大

trans-unit.source: Big-endian
trans-unit.target: Big endian

trans-unit.source: Because the return value of some methods depends on system architecture, be careful when transmitting byte data beyond machine boundaries:
trans-unit.target: 因為某些方法的傳回值，取決於系統架構，請小心傳輸位元組資料超過機器界限時：

trans-unit.source: If all systems sending and receiving data are guaranteed to have the same endianness, nothing has be done to the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果保證傳送和接收資料的所有系統都有相同的 endianness 電腦，不具有執行的資料。

trans-unit.source: If systems sending and receiving data can have different endianness, always transmit data in a particular order.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳送和接收資料的系統可以有 endianness 不同的電腦，永遠傳輸以特定順序的資料。

trans-unit.source: This means that the order of bytes in the array may have to be reversed either before sending them or after receiving them.
trans-unit.target: 這表示位元組陣列中的順序可能需要還原，然後才傳送或接收它們之後。

trans-unit.source: A common convention is to transmit data in network byte order (big-endian order).
trans-unit.target: 常見慣例是傳輸以網路位元組順序 （由小到大的順序） 的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an implementation for sending an integer value in network byte order.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供實作傳送以網路位元組順序的整數值。

trans-unit.source: If systems sending and receiving data can have different endianness and the data to be transmitted consists of signed integers, call the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.HostToNetworkOrder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert the data to network byte order and the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.NetworkToHostOrder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert it to the order required by the recipient.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以傳送和接收資料的系統具有 endianness 不同的電腦和資料傳輸包含帶正負號整數，呼叫<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.HostToNetworkOrder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>將資料轉換成網路位元組順序的方法和<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.NetworkToHostOrder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法將它轉換成所需的順序收件者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of several <xref:System.BitConverter> class methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將說明數個使用<xref:System.BitConverter>類別方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified double-precision floating point number to a 64-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的雙精確度浮點數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit signed integer whose value is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元帶正負號之整數的值等於 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: The order of bits in the integer returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 中所傳回的整數的位元順序<xref:System.BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of several <xref:System.Double> values to <xref:System.Int64> values with the `DoubleToInt64Bits` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將轉換的數個的位元模式<xref:System.Double>值<xref:System.Int64>值與`DoubleToInt64Bits`方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified data to an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的資料轉換成位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 布林值 (Boolean)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified Boolean value as a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的布林值為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: A byte array with length 1.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 1 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: You can convert a byte array back to a <xref:System.Boolean> value by calling the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToBoolean%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將位元組陣列轉換回<xref:System.Boolean>藉由呼叫值<xref:System.BitConverter.ToBoolean%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.Boolean> values to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.Boolean>值<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: A character to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要進行轉換的字元。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified Unicode character value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 Unicode 位元值為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 2.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 2 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.Char> values (Unicode characters) to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.Char>值 （Unicode 字元）<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified double-precision floating point value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的雙精確度浮點數值為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 8.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 8 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.Double> values to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.Double>值<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 16-bit signed integer value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 16 位元帶正負號的整數值為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 2.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 2 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.Int16> values to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.Int16>值<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 32-bit signed integer value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組陣列形式傳回指定的 32 位元帶正負號整數值。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 4.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 4 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.Int32> values to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.Int32>值<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 64-bit signed integer value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 以位元組陣列形式傳回指定的 64 位元帶正負號整數值。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 8.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 8 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method to convert each element in an <xref:System.Int64> array to a <xref:System.Byte> arrays.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法，將轉換中的每個項目<xref:System.Int64>陣列<xref:System.Byte>陣列。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified single-precision floating point value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的單精確度浮點數值為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 4.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 4 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.Single> values to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.Single>值<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 16-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數值為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 2.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 2 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.UInt16> values to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.UInt16>值<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 32-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數值為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 4.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 4 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.UInt32> values to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.UInt32>值<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified 64-bit unsigned integer value as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數值為位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes with length 8.
trans-unit.target: 長度為 8 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of <xref:System.UInt64> values to <xref:System.Byte> arrays with the `GetBytes` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式<xref:System.UInt64>值<xref:System.Byte>陣列與`GetBytes`方法。

trans-unit.source: The number to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的數字。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified 64-bit signed integer to a double-precision floating point number.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 64 位元帶正負號整數轉換為雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating point number whose value is equivalent to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數的值等於 <paramref name="value" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, `value` is an integer that is returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，`value`是一個整數，由<xref:System.BitConverter.DoubleToInt64Bits%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the bit patterns of several <xref:System.Int64> values to <xref:System.Double> values with the `Int64BitsToDouble` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將轉換的數個的位元模式<xref:System.Int64>值<xref:System.Double>值與`Int64BitsToDouble`方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the byte order ("endianness") in which data is stored in this computer architecture.
trans-unit.target: 指出資料儲存在此電腦架構中的位元組順序 (字節順序)。

trans-unit.source: Different computer architectures store data using different byte orders.
trans-unit.target: 使用不同的位元組順序的資料儲存不同的電腦架構。

trans-unit.source: "Big-endian" means the most significant byte is on the left end of a word.
trans-unit.target: "Big-endian"表示最大顯著性位元組上文字的左邊。

trans-unit.source: "Little-endian" means the most significant byte is on the right end of a word.
trans-unit.target: "Little endian"表示最大顯著性位元組文字的右端。

trans-unit.source: You can convert from network byte order to the byte order of the host computer without retrieving the value of the <xref:System.BitConverter.IsLittleEndian?displayProperty=nameWithType> field by passing a 16-bit, 32-bit, or 64 bit integer to the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.HostToNetworkOrder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從網路位元組順序為主機電腦的位元組順序不需要將轉換擷取的值<xref:System.BitConverter.IsLittleEndian?displayProperty=nameWithType>藉由傳遞之 16 位元、 32 位元或 64 位元的整數欄位<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.HostToNetworkOrder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of the `IsLittleEndian` field.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明使用`IsLittleEndian`欄位。

trans-unit.source: A byte array.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the byte within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 內的位元組索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value converted from the byte at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的位元組所轉換的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the byte at <paramref name="startIndex" /> in <paramref name="value" /> is nonzero; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <paramref name="startIndex" /> 中 <paramref name="value" /> 的位元組為非零值 (Nonzero)，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To convert a <xref:System.Boolean> value to its byte representation, call the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToBoolean%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換<xref:System.Boolean>值，其位元組表示法，呼叫以<xref:System.BitConverter.ToBoolean%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.Boolean> values with the `ToBoolean` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.Boolean>值與`ToBoolean`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Unicode character converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的兩個位元組所轉換的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: A character formed by two bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由兩個位元組所形成的字元開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToChar%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 1 to a <xref:System.Char> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToChar%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 1 到<xref:System.Char>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.BitConverter> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>類別主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.Char> values (Unicode characters) with the `ToChar` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.Char>值 （Unicode 字元） 與`ToChar`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> equals the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a double-precision floating point number converted from eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的八個位元組所轉換的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A double precision floating point number formed by eight bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由八個位元組所形成的雙精確度浮點數開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToDouble%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 7 to a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToDouble%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 7<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.BitConverter> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>類別主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.Double> values with the `ToDouble` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.Double>值與`ToDouble`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 7, and is less than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 7，而且小於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 16-bit signed integer converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的兩個位元組所轉換的 16 位元帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer)。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer formed by two bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由兩個位元組所形成的 16 位元帶正負號的整數開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt16%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 1 to an <xref:System.Int16> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt16%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 1 到<xref:System.Int16>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.BitConverter> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>類別主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.Int16> values with the `ToInt16` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.Int16>值與`ToInt16`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> equals the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 32-bit signed integer converted from four bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的四個位元組所轉換的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer formed by four bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由四個位元組所形成的 32 位元帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer)，開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 3 to an <xref:System.Int32> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 3<xref:System.Int32>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of <xref:System.BitConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A> method to create <xref:System.Int32> values from a four-byte array and from the upper four bytes of an eight-byte array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Int32>值從四個位元組陣列，並從上方的四個位元組的八位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%28System.Int32%29> and <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A> methods to round-trip an <xref:System.Int32> value.
trans-unit.target: 它也會使用<xref:System.BitConverter.GetBytes%28System.Int32%29>和<xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt32%2A>方法，以往返<xref:System.Int32>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 3, and is less than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 3，而且小於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 64-bit signed integer converted from eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的八個位元組所轉換的 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit signed integer formed by eight bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由八個位元組所形成的 64 位元帶正負號的整數開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt64%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 7 to a <xref:System.Int64> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToInt64%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 7<xref:System.Int64>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.BitConverter> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>類別主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.Int64> values with the `ToInt64` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.Int64>值與`ToInt64`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 7, and is less than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 7，而且小於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single-precision floating point number converted from four bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的四個位元組所轉換的單精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating point number formed by four bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由四個位元組所形成的單精確度浮點數開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToSingle%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 3 to a <xref:System.Single> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToSingle%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 3<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of <xref:System.BitConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.Single> values with the `ToSingle` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.Single>值與`ToSingle`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 3, and is less than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 3，而且小於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: Converts the numeric value of each element of a specified array of bytes to its equivalent hexadecimal string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之位元組陣列的每一個元素之數值轉換成其對等的十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Converts the numeric value of each element of a specified array of bytes to its equivalent hexadecimal string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之位元組陣列的每一個元素之數值轉換成其對等的十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string of hexadecimal pairs separated by hyphens, where each pair represents the corresponding element in <paramref name="value" />; for example, "7F-2C-4A-00".
trans-unit.target: 一對十六進位的字串是以連字號做為分隔，其中每對各表示 <paramref name="value" /> 中對應的元素，例如 "7F-2C-4A-00"。

trans-unit.source: All the elements of `value` are converted.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目`value`會轉換。

trans-unit.source: The order of hexadecimal strings returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 十六進位字串所傳回的順序<xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.String> objects with the `ToString` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.String>物件與`ToString`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Converts the numeric value of each element of a specified subarray of bytes to its equivalent hexadecimal string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之位元組子陣列的每一個元素之數值轉換成其對等的十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string of hexadecimal pairs separated by hyphens, where each pair represents the corresponding element in a subarray of <paramref name="value" />; for example, "7F-2C-4A-00".
trans-unit.target: 一對十六進位字串是以連字號做為分隔符號，其中每對分別表示 <paramref name="value" /> 子陣列中對應的元素，例如 "7F-2C-4A-00"。

trans-unit.source: The elements from array position `startIndex` to the end of the array are converted.
trans-unit.target: 從陣列位置的項目`startIndex`轉換成陣列的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The order of hexadecimal strings returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 十六進位字串所傳回的順序<xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts the part of a <xref:System.Byte> array starting at the specified `startIndex` to a <xref:System.String> with the `ToString` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的部分<xref:System.Byte>陣列的指定位置開始`startIndex`至<xref:System.String>與`ToString`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: The number of array elements in <c>value</c> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <c>value</c> 中要轉換的陣列元素數目。

trans-unit.source: Converts the numeric value of each element of a specified subarray of bytes to its equivalent hexadecimal string representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之位元組子陣列的每一個元素之數值轉換成其對等的十六進位字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string of hexadecimal pairs separated by hyphens, where each pair represents the corresponding element in a subarray of <paramref name="value" />; for example, "7F-2C-4A-00".
trans-unit.target: 一對十六進位字串是以連字號做為分隔符號，其中每對分別表示 <paramref name="value" /> 子陣列中對應的元素，例如 "7F-2C-4A-00"。

trans-unit.source: The `length` elements from array position `startIndex` are converted.
trans-unit.target: `length`陣列位置中的項目`startIndex`會轉換。

trans-unit.source: If `length` equals zero, the method returns <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`length`等於零，則方法會傳回<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The order of hexadecimal strings returned by the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%2A> method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian.
trans-unit.target: 十六進位字串所傳回的順序<xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%2A>方法取決於電腦架構是否由小到大或位元組由大到小。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%2A> method to convert part of a byte array, starting at the specified `startIndex` and with the specified `length`, to a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.BitConverter.ToString%2A>方法來轉換位元組陣列，開始於指定的組件`startIndex`且具有指定`length`，為字串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> or <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 或 <paramref name="length" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="startIndex" /> is greater than zero and is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大於零，且會大於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: The combination of <paramref name="startIndex" /> and <paramref name="length" /> does not specify a position within <paramref name="value" />; that is, the <paramref name="startIndex" /> parameter is greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus the <paramref name="length" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 和 <paramref name="length" /> 的組合不會指定 <paramref name="value" /> 內的位置，也就是說，<paramref name="startIndex" /> 參數會大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 <paramref name="length" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 16-bit unsigned integer converted from two bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的兩個位元組所轉換的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數 (Unsigned Integer)。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit unsigned integer formed by two bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由兩個位元組所形成的 16 位元不帶正負號的整數開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToUInt16%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 1 to a <xref:System.UInt16> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToUInt16%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 1 到<xref:System.UInt16>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.BitConverter> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>類別主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.UInt16> values with the `ToUInt16` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.UInt16>值與`ToUInt16`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> equals the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 32-bit unsigned integer converted from four bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的四個位元組所轉換的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit unsigned integer formed by four bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由四個位元組所形成的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToUInt32%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 3 to a <xref:System.UInt32> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToUInt32%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 3<xref:System.UInt32>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.BitConverter> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>類別主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.UInt32> values with the `ToUInt32` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.UInt32>值與`ToUInt32`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 3, and is less than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 3，而且小於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The starting position within <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 開始位置在 <c>value</c> 內。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 64-bit unsigned integer converted from eight bytes at a specified position in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從位元組陣列中指定位置的八個位元組所轉換的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit unsigned integer formed by the eight bytes beginning at <paramref name="startIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 由八個位元組所形成的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數開始於 <paramref name="startIndex" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.BitConverter.ToUInt64%2A> method converts the bytes from index `startIndex` to `startIndex` + 7 to a <xref:System.UInt64> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.BitConverter.ToUInt64%2A>方法會將索引轉換位元組`startIndex`至`startIndex`+ 7<xref:System.UInt64>值。

trans-unit.source: The order of bytes in the array must reflect the endianness of the computer system's architecture; for more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.BitConverter> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列中的順序必須反映 endianness 電腦的電腦系統的架構。如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.BitConverter>類別主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example converts elements of <xref:System.Byte> arrays to <xref:System.UInt64> values with the `ToUInt64` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的項目<xref:System.Byte>陣列至<xref:System.UInt64>值與`ToUInt64`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 7, and is less than or equal to the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 7，而且小於或等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the length of <paramref name="value" /> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於零或大於 <paramref name="value" /> 的長度減去 1。
